title: For the sub-division or layout of the land admeasuring 4000 Sq
clause_text: For the sub-division or layout of the land admeasuring 4000 Sq.m. or more (after deducting area under D.P. / R.P. Roads, D.P. Reservations including deemed reservations under these regulations, if any) for residential purpose, minimum 20% of the plot area shall have to be provided either :-
section: For the sub-division or layout of the land :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
